casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gregory Alan ADAMS, Jr. 81P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 14, 2017 Emily H. Davis, Assistant Appellate Defender, Gregory Alan Adams, for Adams, Gregory Alan (Jr.). Ryan Frank Haigh, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of March 2017 by Defendant to Stay and Legal Notice:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of March 2017."
